text: @NCDCgov @Fmohnigeria @radionigeriahq @nmanigeria @nigerianports @LSMOH @OsunPHEOC @FMICNigeria @DrEOEhanire @FCTAbujaPHEOC @ProfAkinAbayomi What's NCDC doing about the rumour of face masks being infected with covid19 distributed in some part of the world. We better test the face mask and other equipment donated by Ali Baba to Nigeria. We should be smart and take clue from Spain and Italy.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
